sentences.sContent: The fabrics are sold wholesale to retailers, fashion houses, and other manufacturers.
sentences.sCn: 这些纺织品批发给零售商、时装店和其他厂家。

sentences.sContent: The fabrics are sold wholesale to retailers, fashion houses, and other manufacturers.
sentences.sCn: 这些纺织品批发给零售商、时装店和其他厂家。

phrases.pCn: 对同业及大客户的大金额银行业务

remMethod.val: whole(全部) + sale(卖) → 整个地卖 → 批发

trans.tranOther: relating to the business of selling goods in large quantities at low prices to other businesses, rather than to the general public
the business of selling goods in large quantities at low prices to other businesses, rather than to the general public
If something is sold wholesale, it is sold in large quantities and at cheaper prices, usually to stores
